transcription: Miley Cyrus near nude pic divides fans as she declares, I'm not sorry. In 2008, Miley apologized for taking part in a shoot with Vanity Fair, where she was pictured wearing nothing but a bed sheet.  I never intended for any of this to happen, and I apologize to my fans, who I care so deeply about.
